AccountAccountRelation.name: AccountAccountRelation
AccountAccountRelation.description: Represents a relationship between accounts, such as a relationship between a business account and a household account.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with this account account relationship.

EndDate.description: The date when the relationship ends.

HierarchyType.description: Specifies the hierarchy between accounts that are related. For example, an account is related to another account as a parent, peer, or child.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the account is actively involved with the related account.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (<parmname>LastReferencedDate</parmname>) but not viewed it.

Name.description: Name of the account account relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedAccountId.description: The related account in the relationship.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the accounts.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship starts.
